title: Agreement to be signed between Sri Lanka and Russia for Cooperation in the field of Fisheries
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Mahinda Amaraweera, the Minister of Fisheries and Aquatic Resources Development, to sign an Agreement for  Cooperation in the Field of Fisheries between the Government of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka and the Government of Russian Federation on mutually beneficial conditions which contribute to the development of the fishing industry, during the official visit of H.E. the President, to Russia from 22nd to 25th of March, 2017, was approved by the Cabinet.
